EXW.name: Ex Works
EXW.description: The seller makes the goods available at their premises. The buyer bears all costs and risks of moving the goods to the destination.
EXW.responsibilities: Buyer covers all costs and risks from the seller's door.

FOB.name: Free On Board
FOB.description: The seller delivers the goods on board the vessel nominated by the buyer at the named port of shipment.
FOB.responsibilities: Seller covers costs until goods are on the ship. Buyer covers everything after.

CIF.name: Cost, Insurance, and Freight
CIF.description: The seller delivers the goods on board the vessel and pays the costs and freight to bring the goods to the named port of destination.
CIF.responsibilities: Seller covers freight and insurance to the destination port.

DDP.name: Delivered Duty Paid
DDP.description: The seller delivers the goods to the buyer, cleared for import and not unloaded from any arriving means of transport at the named place of destination.
DDP.responsibilities: Seller covers all costs and risks including import duties and taxes.
